entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Rain beginning near noon except snow over higher terrain. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:03 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except snow over higher terrain this evening. Snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 08:03 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
